title: PawGo
author: PawGo
content: If any of you used or plan to use BloxHolder (bloxholder.com) there is a serious risk of losing funds. Tool seems to be connected to Lazarus Group.Further technical analysis of the deployed AppleJeus malware uncovered a new variation of DLL side-loading. Really, really tricky.More details: https://www.volexity.com/blog/2022/12/01/buyer-beware-fake-cryptocurrency-applications-serving-as-front-for-applejeus-malware/
